body: i'm thankful for [this sticker about jesus](https://twitter.com/kelsey_dallas/status/938864770299527168), which is so dumb on so many levels that it's kind of fascinating. i'm thankful for [this lovely gloss on a james tate poem starring jesus](https://twitter.com/appraisal_daily/status/939272736295309312) (i'm thankful for poems that shift from the third person to the first person at the end, which always gets me). i'm thankful for "[jesus walks](https://open.spotify.com/track/62r62ArmWq38cu6QCVgyTc)" and for "[jesus etc](https://open.spotify.com/track/4wd09wCccmxUB7XVJp0RNn)." and for "[jesus](https://open.spotify.com/track/6454gzQGY6133yoMMnaVcN)."\_\_\_PARAGRAPH\_BREAK\_\_\_
